title.rendered: “Israeli Defense Forces Strike Hezbollah’s Rocket Launch Sites and Military Structures in Lebanon: Responding to Recent Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked rocket launching sites, a terror infrastructure, and a military structure of the terror organization Hezbollah in Lebanese territory.

A short while ago, fighter jets of the Air Force attacked rocket launching sites, a terror infrastructure, and a military structure of the terror organization Hezbollah in Lebanese territory in response to the rocket fire towards the state of Israel yesterday (Monday).

In addition, a launch was identified towards the Zre’it area, the IDF attacked the sources of the shooting in Lebanese territory. Moreover, the IDF attacked several areas in Lebanese territory with artillery fire to remove threats.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/4a8rnjy
